mapper.select: SELECT comment_id AS commentId, schedule_id AS scheduleId, writer_id AS writerId, writer_name AS writerName, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM schedule_comment WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId} ORDER BY comment_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_comment (schedule_id, writer_id, writer_name, content) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{writerId}, #{writerName}, #{content})
